comments:
Exception is thrown out when set blank value for the parameter

Build number: 2.2.0.v20061107-0635

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the attached design file.
2. Only choose value for the first parameter, leave the second and the third 
   blank.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Created an attachment (id=55180)
Update design file

This issue can be reproduced when use "/run" or "/preview" mode.(Call RunAndRenderTask). But frameset( Call RunTask and RenderTask ) is OK.
I have checked the code, the parameter value map has been passed into RunAndRenderTask. Engine Team please check it first. Thanks.

the exception is thrown out by DTE which means:

the parameter of the data set can't be NULL 

instead of 

report parameter can't be NULL.

It is the correct behavior.

traces.message: Default value for input parameter cannot be null.
Default value for input parameter cannot be null.
